segments.text: This kitchen is a total disaster, water everywhere from that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing in it, drying a plate without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron probably getting soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies like little thieves on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, greedy for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, making the floor gross and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping wet, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, but inside it's filthy chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bunched towel, stacked dishes, all messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this kind of sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drain not working, just letting it flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whole scene turns my stomach with neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
